entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
